授業目的: The objective of this course is to deepen the understandings of international economies and to obtain analytical skills from the viewpoint of economics.
到達目標:
1. Students understand a basic theory of international trade
2. Students are able to access to databases relevant for international economies and analyze them correctly
3. Students present their own output for a specific topic assigned in the course
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.

【合併】International Trade（総合政策学部）/国際貿易論（総合政策学部）

第2回: Japanese economy from balance of payments
第3回: How can we access to databases for international trade?
第5回: Benefits of trade and costs of tariff: Case of small country
第6回: Benefits of trade: Case of large country
第7回: Costs of tariff: Case of large country
第12回:
Aid-for-trade④
・How can we collect data on foreign aid using OECD database?
第13回:
Aid-for-trade⑤
・What can we learn from prior research?
トピック.授業計画1: All lectures will be delivered in face-to-face format
